data.message: Hello Facebook Team, How can i recover the page that I made from another email, I can confirm to you which email address I used and the editors of the page, It is Master Maids Cleaning Services Page I am referring to. I badly need an help from you guys. Waiting for your response.. THx

replies.message: Hi there. Please keep in mind that if a Page is unmanaged, you'll see Unofficial Page below its cover photo. If a Page is managed, however, you won't see the option to claim it: http://bit.ly/2vmmyD6. Instead, you can report the Page: http://bit.ly/2hgT1oj. Hope this helps! -Ashley
